title: The $80 Smartphone Challenge
description: More info on MetroPCS:  Twitter gave me a series of challenges to do with an $80 smartphone.  Find the Alcatel A30 Fierce here: This video was sponsored by MetroPCS. Video@480p. Users exceeding 32GB may have reduced speeds. No tethering. This Smartphone Is All You Need:   Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:
